name: Avoid using obsolete "String Operations" statements in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the programs having obsolete "String Operations" statements.
output:
This report lists RPG400 programsusing obsolete "String Operations" statements in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only).
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: During the upgrade of the different RPG versions (V2 / V3 / ILE V4) some statements are no longer supported. Where ever in the code these statements the artifact is reported as a violation.
remediation: Try to replace these statements with some other non obsolete.
remediationSample:
Please refer the link below for the supported string operations,
http://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSAE4W_9.1.1/com.ibm.etools.iseries.langref.doc/evferlsh254.htm
